trans-unit.source: Supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform queries and other operations against entity data.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control as the owner of the current view.
The data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object is associated with.
A unique name for the data source view within the scope of the data source control that owns it.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports the delete operation.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports the insert operation.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports paging of retrieved data.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the retrieved data.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports the update operation.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> has finished creating the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"></xref> used to bind data to controls.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> creates the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"></xref> used in data binding.
Occurs before an <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"></xref> is disposed.
Occurs after an object has been deleted from the data source.
Occurs before an object is deleted from the data source.
Occurs when validation fails in a partial methods or when an exception is raised.
Performs a delete operation.
The keys of the entity to be deleted.
The values of the entity to be deleted.
The number of rows deleted; otherwise, -1, if the operation fails or the number is not known.
Performs an insert operation.
The values of the entity to be inserted.
The number of rows inserted; otherwise, -1, if the operation fails or the number is not known.
Performs a select operation.
The select operation arguments.
The result of the select operation.
Performs an update operation.
The keys of the entity to be updated.
The new values of the entity to be updated.
The old values of the entity to be updated.
The number of rows updated; otherwise, -1, if the operation fails or the number is not known.
Returns a table that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref>.
A table that contains the properties of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref>.
Occurs after a new object is created at the data source.
Occurs before a new object is persisted to the data source.

Occurs after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> has created an Entity SQL query that was specified during the configuration of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
For more information, see [Applying LINQ Queries to EntityDataSource](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/cb70db56-9f9d-4b79-98fe-f03dd5ad1e38).
Occurs after a query has been executed.
Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.
Occurs after changes to an object have been persisted to the data source.
Occurs before changes to an object are persisted to the data source.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
`true` if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, `false`.
Restores the previously saved view state for the data source view.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> control state to restore.
Saves the changes to view state for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> control's view state, or `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if there is no view state associated with the object.
Tracks view state changes.
